title: International Speaker Mike Lipkin And Free For All Marketing Launch First-of-its-kind Custom Conference Planning Service: E.P.I.C Events
text: Reprint TORONTO , July 14, 2015 /CNW/ - Free For All Marketing and Mike Lipkin are pleased to announce the launch of E.P.I.C. Events, a new one-stop-shop conference and workshop ideation and planning service combining the energy and expertise of one of the world's top motivational speakers with the experience of leading event planning experts. From concept to completion, E.P.I.C. Events will deliver unique, turnkey events that are: Educational. Participative. Inspirational. Customized. According to an MPI Report ( Meetings Outlook TM , 2015 Spring Edition), professional meeting planners from around the world predict an increase in live attendance at conferences and events (60%) vs. virtual attendance (56%) going forward. "The more digital the world becomes, the more people crave real, live, personal interactions," said Mike Lipkin of Environics/Lipkin. "However, the kind of live meetings that turn people on today is a very different kind of experience than those from the past. Meetings that deliver ROI, must be educational, participative, inspirational and customized." The launch of E.P.I.C. Events, combines the energy and leadership of Mike Lipkin with the premier event management expertise of Free For All Marketing to deliver turnkey conference or workshop solutions. Mike Lipkin helps businesses skillfully craft, create, plan and deliver strategic custom programming that connects with every participant. In the last 12 months, Mike Lipkin has spoken to over one hundred thousand people in over 150 international programs from Russia to South Africa to the USA and Canada. From destination and property selection to group travel to online registration to staging and execution, E.P.I.C. Events will deliver events that motivate and inspire. Be it an intimate local leadership session for forty or an international destination conference for four hundred, E.P.I.C. Events will produce once-in-a lifetime experiences designed to motivate and move businesses forward. 1 of 2
